name: brave-real-puppeteer-playwright-core

scripts.patch-puppeteer: node ./scripts/enhanced-patcher.js patch-comprehensive --packageName=puppeteer-core && npm run create-brave-puppeteer && npm run ai-agent
scripts.patch-playwright: node ./scripts/enhanced-patcher.js patch-comprehensive --packageName=playwright-core && npm run create-brave-playwright && npm run ai-agent
scripts.patch-both: npm run version-sync && npm run patch-puppeteer-basic && npm run patch-playwright-basic && npm run create-brave-packages && npm run ai-agent && npm run check-versions
scripts.setup-puppeteer: npm install puppeteer-core && npm run patch-puppeteer && npm run test-bot-detector-headless && echo ğŸ­ Puppeteer-core setup completed with EVERYTHING!
scripts.setup-playwright: npm install playwright-core && npm run patch-playwright && npm run test-bot-detector-headless && echo ğŸª Playwright-core setup completed with EVERYTHING!
scripts.setup-both: npm install puppeteer-core playwright-core && npm run patch-both && npm run test-bot-detector-headless && echo ğŸ¯ Both engines setup completed with ALL FEATURES!
scripts.setup-both-basic: npm install puppeteer-core playwright-core && npm run patch-puppeteer-basic && npm run patch-playwright-basic && echo ğŸ¯ Both engines setup completed with stealth only!
scripts.setup-complete: npm install puppeteer-core playwright-core && npm run version-sync && npm run patch-both && npm run ai-agent && npm run test-bot-detector-headless && echo ğŸš€ Complete setup with stealth + AI + testing completed!
scripts.install-puppeteer: npm install puppeteer-core && npm run patch-puppeteer
scripts.install-playwright: npm install playwright-core && npm run patch-playwright
scripts.create-brave-packages: npm run version-sync && npm run create-brave-puppeteer && npm run create-brave-playwright
scripts.setup-ai-enhanced: npm install puppeteer-core playwright-core && npm run patch-both && npm run create-brave-packages && npm run ai-agent && echo ğŸ¤– AI-Enhanced setup with Brave packages completed!
scripts.setup-ultimate: npm install puppeteer-core playwright-core && npm run patch-both && npm run test-bot-detector && npm run test-bot-detector-mobile && echo ğŸ”¥ Ultimate setup with all features completed!
